entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3 except zero inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3 except zero inland. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
